'''''Amon Hen'' 60''' is the sixtieth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in February [[1983]].

** By: M. Allaby

* Smial Committee

* Notices - [[Quettar]]
* Notices - Bank Charges
* Notices - Back Issues
* Smial Quiz
** By: Fingloriel
* Reviews Request
* Reviews
** By: M. Mertens, M. Woolrich, A. Bough, G. Morgan, J.R. Hinves
* Dragons
** By: J. Houghton, M. Bywater, M. Mertens

* Smial Please
* Tolk Folk
* Letters

** By: [[Helen Armstrong|H. Armstrong]]
